original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1166)@</color>以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(926)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對前方範圍內敵方造成物理傷害，並依據擊殺的士兵數量補充自身預備兵，同時召喚 <color=#ccffcc>9</color> 隻<color=#4cc769>兵奴</color>加入我軍。<color=#4cc769>兵奴</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1256)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1256)@</color>
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1166)@</color> to <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(926)@</color><color=#80cc00>War</color> inflicts physical damage to the enemy in the front range, and supplements its own reserve soldiers based on the number of soldiers killed, and also summons <color=#ccffcc>9</color> only <color=#4cc769>Soldiers</color> join our army. <color=#4cc769>Soldiers</color>Attributes <color=#FFE787>Physical strength: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1256)@</color> <color=#FFE787>War: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1256)@</color>
